articles.title: Trump floats tariff 'dividends' even while plan shows major flaws - NPR
articles.description: President Trump says the government will distribute checks to Americans from tariff revenue. Here's what that could mean.
articles.content: President Trump has bragged many times about the revenue tariffs are bringing in money paid by American businesses, who pass some of the costs on to consumers. Over the weekend, Trump pushed the idea… [+3613 chars]

articles.title: Trump Defends 50-Year Mortgage Plan, Calling It ‘Not a Big Deal’ - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: President Donald Trump downplayed criticism of the potential creation of a 50-year mortgage product, saying it would help more Americans afford monthly payments on homes.
articles.content:
